resources.string: Software engineering professional with around 3 years of experience developing and maintaining diverse systems within fast-paced, high-pressure environments. Blends strong analytical, technical, and team collaboration skills to deliver quality IT solutions, system features, and tools to address the needs of users. Skilled at facilitating data sharing, tracking, and storage – supporting attainment of challenging objectives

Languages: JavaScript, Java, React, Angular, Kotlin
 Web: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, React, ThymeLeaf
 Web services: REST, SOAP
 Web App/Serves: Apache Tomcat
 Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring, Angular, Express
 Databases: Oracle SQL, Postgress SQL, MongoDB
 Design patterns: Singleton, factory
 SDLC: Waterfall, Agile/Scrum
 Tools: Maven, STS, Jenkins, IntelliJ, Jira, Postman, Docket, Git, JUnit
 Platforms: Window, Linux

E-wallet mobile phone application for money transfers and bill pays.
 Built and maintained system within high-pressure operational platform.
 • Developed payment channel between Momo and various banks as well as mobile network operators.
 • Created game’s money and achievements management features.
 • Enhanced data transfer amongst teams as well as related data analysis.
 Technologies Used: Kotlin, MySQL, NoSQL, Cassandra, Bigtable, BigQuery, Pubsub, Linux
Please, reach out to me for more information.

Software engineering professional with around 3 years of experience developing and maintaining diverse systems within fast-paced, high-pressure environments. Blends strong analytical, technical, and team collaboration skills to deliver quality IT solutions, system features, and tools to address the needs of users. Skilled at facilitating data sharing, tracking, and storage – supporting attainment of challenging objectives.
Master of Science in Computer Science
